input.name: pw_scf.in
input.rendered:
&CONTROL
    calculation = 'scf'
    title = ''
    verbosity = 'low'
    restart_mode = 'from_scratch'
    wf_collect = .true.
    tstress = .true.
    tprnfor = .true.
    outdir = '{{ JOB_WORK_DIR }}/outdir'

/
&SYSTEM
    ibrav = 0

    ntyp = 1

    ecutrho = 200

/
&ELECTRONS

    diago_full_acc = .true.

/

input.content:
&inputpp
    calculation = "eps"
    prefix = "__prefix__"
    outdir = {% raw %}'{{ JOB_WORK_DIR }}/outdir'{% endraw %}
/

&energy_grid
    smeartype = "gauss"
    intersmear = 0.2
    intrasmear = 0.0
    wmin =  0.0
    wmax = 30.0
    nw = 500
    shift = 0.0
/
